meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>obsolete</kanji> and this word means <vocabulary>to become obsolete</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: Everything has <vocabulary>to become obsolete</vocabulary>. Even the biggest most fiery things, like a <reading>sta</reading>r, for example, will go obsolete at some point.
